"At the right moment," it said, we may want to give Saddam Hussein a way out for his family to live in comfort. Known and Unknown, the former Defense secretary says he believed that "an aggressive diplomatic effort, coupled by a threat of military force, just might convince Saddam Hussein and those around him to seek exile."

confirmed that it would be proper for the attorney general to obtain the views of ministers on the national interest before reaching his own independent decision. Ministers' views would be passed to the DPP and he would then exercise independent judgment, taking on board the serious considerations that have been given to the matter by other ministers and the attorney general . All this strikes me as perfectly proper. Before authorising the arrest and detention of a visiting politician such as Henry Kissinger or Donald Rumsfeld , the DPP would take into account any views expressed by William Hague or Liam Fox

The Democrats, who used similar messaging leading up to the healthcare reform repeal vote, are trying to paint Republican healthcare efforts as a distraction from creating jobs. I do not understand how this Republican Congress can move from that mandate to create jobs, to create opportunities in this country, toward how we undermine women's reproductive health, said Barbara Boxer Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.). Abortion-rights groups, mobilizing to combat efforts to limit reproductive services, hammered home that same point. "The House leadership is clearly out of touch with the

Sergey Brin , meanwhile, will now devote his time to strategic projects and new product development. Commenting on these changes in a press release ahead of the company's earnings call today, Eric Schmidt said, We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.
